original_title: Dialog Axiata champions’ excellence in journalism at annual awards
original_body_lines: Dialog Axiata PLC Brand and Media Vice President Harsha Samaranayake (right) presents the Best Designed News Website (English) for www.ft.lk

Dialog Axiata PLC, Sri Lanka’s premier connectivity provider, supported the Journalism Awards for Excellence 2022 as the digital media sponsor, underscoring its commitment to fostering excellence in journalism, reflected by its steadfast support for journalistic achievements since 2014.

The 24th edition of the prestigious “Journalism Awards for Excellence 2022,” held at the Mount Lavinia Hotel, celebrated the outstanding contributions of Sri Lanka’s print media across all three languages. Organised by The Editors’ Guild of Sri Lanka in collaboration with the Sri Lanka Press Institute and affiliated unions, the event recognised and rewarded exceptional professionalism in journalism.

Dialog Axiata PLC Brand and Media Vice President Harsha Samaranayake said: “We are honoured to support the advancement of journalism by supporting the Journalism Awards for Excellence 2022 as the digital media sponsor. Dialog Axiata recognises the pivotal role journalism plays in shaping societies and fostering informed communities. Our steadfast support since 2014 reflects our belief in the power of media excellence.”
